overview: Rebecca Ward brings to Tealeaf a wealth of experience in managing and growing technology businesses. Rebecca joined Tealeaf as CEO in 2004 after serving as entrepreneur in residence at Foundation Capital. Previously, Rebecca served as group president of engineering, marketing, and product development at Digex. Prior to joining Digex, Rebecca worked for BBN/GTE Internetworking, where she held the position of vice president of product management and engineering. Rebecca began her career with Xerox.
